1:
--------------------
Text: Kegelhelm:  It is an open-faced helmet of roughly conical shape, sometimes with extensions at the sides to protect the cheeks, or a crest-holder on top.

Triplets:<Kegelhelm
2:
--------------------
Text: Kegelhelm:  It was made of bronze, sometimes in several pieces.

Triplets:<Kegelhelm
4:
--------------------
Text: Kegelhelm:  It did not outlast the eighth century BC.
Triplets:<Kegelhelm
